description: The Eiswand Guide ML Jacket Men: a robust, durable, very versatile, warm mid-layer made from high-quality Pontetorto® Merino Tecnowool® for optimum comfort and a perfect temperature. It impresses with improved breathability thanks to thin mesh material under the arms and the antibacterial effect of the wool, which limits unpleasant odors. Eiswand Guide ML Jacket Men functions as an outer layer and as an insulating layer underneath a weatherproof jacket.
name: Mammut Eiswand Guide ML Jacket - Mens
